ok search for

Code:

public boolean superRestore = false;

  1. above that add

Code:

public static boolean AutoSave = false; 
public int savecounter = 0;
  1. next search for

Code:

public boolean process() {

  1. once found that line add this under

Code:

savecounter++;
if(savecounter >= 120 && AutoSave == false) {
AutoSave = true;
savecounter = 0;
}

  1. next search for

Code:

if(firingspell == true)

  1. once found add this above it

Code:

savecounter++;
if(savecounter >= 120 && AutoSave == false) {
AutoSave = true;
savecounter = 0;
}

  1. save and compile then it will auto save
